page.title: 12LIFE STYLES
page.content: AS PART OF OUR DOMESDAY PROJECT WE SENT OUT QUESTIONNAIRES TO ALL THE PEOPLE LIVING IN OUR AREA. WE WANTED TO FIND OUT AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE ABOUT THEIR HOME LIFE AND LIFE STYLES IN HINDHEAD IN I985 WE DISCOVERED THAT THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE LIVE IN POST-WAR, DETACHED HOUSING, BUILT OF BRICK, WITH GARDENS OF AT LEAST A QUARTER OF AN ACRE. THESE HOUSES WERE MOSTLY BETWEEN 5-IO YEARS OLD AND WERE OWNER-OCCUPIED FAMILY HOMES. THERE WERE ALSO A HIGH PROPORTION OF BUNGALOWS AND MANY OF THE LARGE VICTORIAN HOUSES HAD BEEN CONVERTED INTO FLATS. IT BECAME CLEAR TO US THAT THIS AREA ATTRACTS MANY WEALTHY, RETIRED PEOPLE AND SUCCESSFUL PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE AND THEIR FAMILIES WHO WISH TO LIVE IN THE COUNTRY WHILST BEING WITHIN EASY REACH OF LONDON.
